--------------213D3ED4261B316D4D349C13

Hi,
        Iam facing the problem while trying to run the Servlet using Cactus
(though i have done the complete configuration).
       I have registered the ServletRedirector in the cactus.properties file and
still iam getting the exception as java.io.FileNotFoundException:
http://172.20.10.100/PayMate/ServletRedirector

Iam using  ApacheJserv1.1 ?As this  supports only Jsdk2.0,iam doubtful that
whether this tool is compatible with servlet.jar2.0?

In log files it is showing the following error
[31/05/2001 12:02:57:126] (ERROR) ajp12: Servlet Error:
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: javax.servlet.ServletContext: method
setAttribute(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/Object;)V not found:
javax.servlet.ServletContext: method
setAttribute(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/Object;)V not found

From this it is clearly understandable that Jsdk2.0 which iam using doesn't have
setAttribute method  and is there any lower version of cactus which is flexible
with Jsdk2.0

With out using higher version of Jsdk is there any solution for this?

waiting for the earliest reply
regards,
Sandhya Sree




--------------213D3ED4261B316D4D349C13
Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<!doctype html public "-//w3c//dtd html 4.0 transitional//en">
<html>
 
<br>Hi,
<br>        Iam facing the problem while
trying to run the Servlet using Cactus (though i have done the complete
configuration).
<br>       I have registered the ServletRedirector
in the cactus.properties file and still iam getting the exception as java.io.FileNotFoundException:
<A HREF="http://172.20.10.100/PayMate/ServletRedirector">http://172.20.10.100/PayMate/ServletRedirector</A>
<p>Iam using  <b>ApacheJserv1.1</b> ?As this  supports only <b>Jsdk2.0</b>,iam
doubtful that whether this tool is compatible with servlet.jar2.0?
<p>In log files it is showing the following error
<br><b><font color="#3333FF">[31/05/2001 12:02:57:126] (ERROR) ajp12: Servlet
Error: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: javax.servlet.ServletContext: method
setAttribute(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/Object;)V not found: javax.servlet.ServletContext:
method setAttribute(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/Object;)V not found</font></b>
<p>From this it is clearly understandable that Jsdk2.0 which iam using
doesn't have setAttribute method  and is there any lower version of
cactus which is flexible with Jsdk2.0
<p>With out using higher version of Jsdk is there any solution for this?
<br> 
<br>waiting for the earliest reply
<br>regards,
<br>Sandhya Sree
